forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. A few peeks of sunshine possible. High 44F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening giving way to a few snow showers after midnight. Low 28F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 30F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 8C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 46F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening changing to a mix of steady rain and freezing rain overnight. Low around 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening then a mix of rain and freezing rain overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High near 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
